verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: ratcheted] up [ARG1: its criticism of China] [ARGM-LOC: in an extensive report released by the White House on Tuesday detailing " economic aggression " by the Asian giant] .

The Trump administration ratcheted up its criticism of China in [ARG1: an extensive report] [V: released] [ARG0: by the White House] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] detailing " economic aggression " by the Asian giant .
The Trump administration ratcheted up its criticism of China in [ARG0: an extensive report released by the White House on Tuesday] [V: detailing] [ARG1: " economic aggression " by the Asian giant] .
